Page.title: UI Design & Frontend.
Page.about:
Hello! I’m Erick Paluan, a graduate in Information Systems, specialized at the intersection of design and code.

Over the past 15 years, I’ve mastered two fields that rarely talk to each other: I’ve created visual identities, finalized materials for offset printing, and designed digital interfaces. But I didn’t stop at Figma.

I learned how to code to turn prototypes into real products. I built the IT department at CEARP, developed systems in production, and discovered that my greatest strength lies exactly where design and development meet.

Today, I build fullstack applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript, always with the mindset of someone who deeply understands UX. I don’t need a translator between design and dev — I speak both languages.

If you’re looking for someone who:
- Designs intuitive interfaces and implements them
- Understands code architecture and design systems
- Can communicate seamlessly with both designers and engineers
- Delivers products, not just screens or lines of code

Then let’s talk.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.project-description: Project for the completion of the 4th semester in Systems Analysis and Development, UNIP Ribeirão Preto, 2023.
